title: The Fantastic Fiddle feat. Adam Irigoyen
dc:creator: WBUR
description: This Hispanic tale from the Southwest U.S. stars Adam Irigoyen (Away, Shake It Up) as a fiddler whose magical instrument brings the world to its feet, and the guilty to their knees.
itunes:author: WBUR
